attributes.action: require that whenever a reference (employment, credit, CRB &c) is obtained on a person they must be informed prior to it being obtained and a copy provided to them by the person/organisation obtaining it, at no cost to them
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the amount of 'bad data' available and the propensity for former employers to provide inaccurate references (e.g. saying someone left whilst under disciplinary investigation) there must be a facility for the subject to check.

This should be overseen by the Information commissioner who should be given extra powers and funding to enforce it.
